articles.title: A look at COVID-19 nightlife clusters in Asia - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: A growing number of COVID-19 infections linked to KTV lounges and clubs has seen local transmission of the virus surge in recent days in Singapore.

SINGAPORE: A growing number of COVID-19 infections linked to KTV lounges and clubs has seen local transmission of the virus surge in recent days in Singapore.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Afghan government says it retakes Pakistan border crossing from Taliban - Times of India
articles.description: South Asia News: KABUL: Afghan security forces have retaken control of a major southern border crossing with Pakistan that the Taliban briefly captured, a senior Afgha.
articles.content: Afghan government says it retakes Pakistan border crossing from Taliban

articles.author: Masrur Jamaluddin and Joshua Berlinger, CNN
articles.title: Indonesia overtakes India as Asia's new Covid-19 epicenter - CNN
articles.description: Indonesia reported 54,517 new cases of Covid-19, authorities said Wednesday, a single-day national record and dire warning sign for the world's fourth-most populous country.
articles.content: Jakarta, Indonesia (CNN)Indonesia reported 54,517 new cases of Covid-19, authorities said Wednesday, a single-day national record and dire warning sign for the world's fourth-most populous country. … [+4262 chars]
